definitions.definition: To make indistinct or hazy, to obscure or dim.
definitions.example: to blur a photograph by moving the camera while taking it
to blur a manuscript by handling it while damp

definitions.definition: To cause imperfection of vision in; to dim; to darken.
To sully; to stain; to blemish, as reputation.
To transfer the input focus away from.
Out of focus; partially obscured; smudged.
